President Trump announced a framework for a trade deal with the UK, marking the first agreement reached by the White House since imposing new global tariffs. title: Europe Needs an Economic NATO | Opinion
content: Europe is losing ground fast. Since 2000, productivity growth has lagged 30 percent behind the U.S. The same trend holds for venture capital (VC). Over the past decade, the European Union (EU) has av… [+5261 chars]
summary: Europe is experiencing a significant decline in productivity growth and venture capital compared to the United States. Since 2000, productivity growth in Europe has lagged behind the U.S by 30%, while venture capital investments in Europe have fallen significantly short of those in the U.S over the past decade. This trend is concerning for the European economy and may impact its ability to compete globally.

summary: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against Perpetua Resources Corp. (PPTA) due to potential violations of securities laws. The lawsuit alleges that the company made false and misleading statements to investors regarding its business operations and financial performance. The plaintiff seeks damages on behalf of all purchasers of the company's stock between May 2022 and February 2023.
